About Yuva Vikas Samiti
Yuva Vikas Samiti’(YVS) is primarily involved in availing Skill, Education, Health-care and
Nutrition facilities to marginalized Community. Yuva VIkas Samiti is a group of youth of
divergent background irrespective of their age, race, class, social status and gender. The
group belongs to different regions, and has different skills, talents, and knowledge. How best
can we use these creative talents; we will endeavour through various mediums to reach to
the unreached. We the youth are convinced of our Indian constitutional values and are
committed to constitutional processes.. it was registered as a society in 2007.
Currently, Yuva Vikas Samiti (YVS) is working in 10 districts directly of Eastern Uttar Pradesh
and 01 district of Jharkhand for empowering the community, with special focus on issues that
affect Youth, women and children.

Current & Past Project
ISA- Jal Jeevan Misssion-
Yuva VIkas Samiti is working in 2 District ( Ambedkar Nagar & Balrampur ) of Uttar Pradesh as
Implementation Support Agency (ISA) under Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM)
The objectives of ISAs are as follows-
 To facilitate constitution of sub-committee of Gram Panchayat, i.e. VWSC and arrange to
build capacities of its functionaries;
 To provide handhold Gram Panchayat and VWSC;
 To conduct need assessment of FHTCs and motivate village communities to have FHTCs;
 Act as coordination platform between DWSM and VWSC;
 By using Participatory Rural Appraisal (PRA) tools for community mobilization and carry out
need assessment;
 To assist the community in water campaigns initiated by Government of India/ state
Government;
 To build awareness on various aspects of water such as rain water harvesting, artificial
recharge, water quality, water-borne disease, water saving, water handling, drinking water
source augmentation/ sustainability aspects, etc;

--- Page 6 ---
 To document and upload success stories from villages;
 To Carry out Social Behavioural Change Communication (SBCC) activities
National Handicrafts Development Programme (NHDP
Yuva Vikas Samiti Run Project The National Handicrafts Development Programme (NHDP) is a
government scheme that supports artisans and handicraft clusters. The National Handicrafts
Development Programme (NHDP) scheme offers end-to-end support to millions of handicraft
artisans. The Pradhan Mantri Vishwakarma Kaushal Samman (PM-VIKAS) scheme will also help
artisans improve the quality, scale, and reach of their products.
Popularisation of Science Project
Yuva Vikas Samiti is Oragnized in many Science Mela & Tours Supported by National Council for
Science & Technology Communication NCSTC (Department of Science & Technology (DST) Govt. of
India) The Project main objective popularize Science & Technology amongst the people of the
general and younger generation in particular.
International Women’s Day
Yuva Vikas Samiti is organized different activities on International Women’s Day 2022 supported by
Vishwa Yuvak Kendra.
Nanhi Pahal Project
Yuva Vikas Samiti is provided dry ration and sanitary items to specially abled people (PWDs)
supported by Vishwa Yuvak Kendram New Delhi under Nanhi Pahal Project .took a step forward in
providing alms and support to the specially abled. This relief providing practice will help them
overcome the sorrows due to COVID-19. A large population lost livelihood and starved for days and
among them were also persons with disability. The project spans in Basti District of Uttar Pradesh
and aims to provide relief to the specially abled and help them cope with the pandemic.
Physical Literacy Program
Physical Literacy Program (Conducted the Exposure Visits for around 200 Youths in all the branches
of Standard Chartered Bank across Uttar Pradesh with an objective to create an understanding of the
Operations of Bank with and ultimately to enhance the financial literacy among the underprivileged
population of Youth)
Project SAKSHAM
Yuva Vikas Samiti in association with Indian development foundation is conducting the Financial
literacy program In 3 District of Uttar Pradesh. Project SAKSHAM aims to deliver sessions on various
essential topics of financial management such as Budgeting, Savings, Investment, and Credit
worthiness as these learnings will help students get equipped with the basic financial skills and
knowledge required to navigate through this challenging financial world and make sound financial
decisions independently. This program is designed to give such a Target Group, the relevant & crisp
inputs of how to be self-sufficient with the knowledge of managing their meager finances. Therefore
the target group should be women who are in blue-colored jobs and housewives and girl
college students who need to be self-sufficient with what ever meager amount that they have or
get.
S3 - Sarva Sakhi Swabhiman Project
Yuva Vikas Samiti is Implement is S3 - Sarva Sakhi Swabhiman Project A large section of Youth
women in Basti District Supported by Indian Development Foundation both in rural and urban slums
need to be educated and empowered. A Youth group of women were presented with tailoring
machine and embroidery machine. Now the project has taken good shape and the trained women
are able to make products which can help them to generate income for their livelihood. YVS in its
next step is going ahead in educating the women in urban slums, particularly parents of the children
studying in Bal Gurukuls. The programme is designed to suit the home-makers as it will help them to
get acclimatized with their wards education.
Bal Gurukul Project
Yuva Vikas Samiti is Implementing Bal Gurukul Project in 7 District of 2 States Uttar Pradesh and
Jharkhand. YVS-IDF Bal Gurukul projects are a success proven sustainable development model. IDF

--- Page 7 ---
in its diversified objectives has included village development and education programmes into its fold.
development. Primary IDF and Blackstone Charitable Foundation supported 06 Bal Gurukuls and RBL
bank sanctioned 02 Bal Gurukuls in this financial year.
Project Sui Dhaga Ji
Yuva Vikas Samiti is implement Project SuiDhagaJi in Basti District of Uttar Pradesh is a program
designed to empower Youth women through Skill development. The concept here is to provide
sewing Machine, and a suitable place, training material and a trainer. The training Centre operates as
the basic tailoring learning Centre and also imparts specialized training like embroidery and soft-toy
making. The knowledge and the acumen gathered here in this program will further help them to
have a productive unit of their own from where they can flourish and grow.
Environmental Programmes
Yuva Vikas Samiti has been working towards raising awareness about environmental issues and
protecting the planet through various joint awareness programmes at both institutional and
community levels with the active support of corporations, academia, and NGOs. Their tireless efforts
aim to educate individuals and communities.
BADHTE KADAM Scheme
Yuva Vikas Samiti Implemented Badhte Kadam Scheme aims at community awareness, sensitization,
social integration and mainstreaming of Persons with Disabilities. It has the following objectives:
Raise awareness in the public, regarding Persons with Disability (PwD) covered under the National
Trust Act and encourage their inclusion in the society, social integration and participation in all
aspects of life.
Disseminate information on preventive strategies for disabilities under the National Trust Act,1999.
Sensitize community stakeholders.
Publicize and maximize benefits of the National Trust schemes PwDs, and families of PwDs.
Increase representation in remote areas and areas where the National Trust is underrepresented.
Spread awareness about myths and misconceptions about disability, disability etiquette, etc.
AkshayaDhaaga Skill Centre
AkshayaDhaaga Skill Centre for a complete tailoring course to support 25 women in a centre. (Course
duration 3 months/ 150 hours). Implemented in Five District Supported by Askshaya Shakti Welfare
Associatiom Mumbai. Lets together make things great and impact lives. A step towards skilling and
creating self-reliance among women.
Akshaya Project
With the help of Mamta Helth Institute Mother & Child New Delhi this project is being operated in district
Ambedkar Nagar. The object of this project is to build T.B. Free society.
Qualitaty Basic Education
YVS involved on the effective implementation of the Free and Compulsory Child Education Rights Act,
capacity building workshops are organized from time to time with the help of Lokmita Rae Bareli,
Basic Education Forum Uttar Pradesh & Scores UP.Under which the capacity building of the school
management committees constituted under the supervision of the council schools of primary and
junior level has been done, and from time to time the sensitization of public representatives and
officials is also done on this issue.
Library Programme
With the help of Uttar Pradesh Pustkalay Prakosth U.P. Govt. and Raja Ram Mohan Rai Pustakalaya
Pratisthan Kolkata for framing Literacy and Educational environment in rural areas libraries are being
operated.
National Environment Awareness Programme
Operation of Awareness movements is continuing in District Basti with co-operation of Shoharatgarh
Environmental Society Siddharth Nagar and ministry of Environment and forest Govt. of India.
